trans-unit.source: Sign ins from IP addresses with suspicious activity
trans-unit.target: Sign ins from IP addresses with suspicious activity

trans-unit.source: A report that includes sign in attempts that have been executed from IP addresses where suspicious activity has been noted.
trans-unit.target: A report that includes sign in attempts that have been executed from IP addresses where suspicious activity has been noted.

trans-unit.source: Sign ins from IP addresses with suspicious activity
trans-unit.target: Sign ins from IP addresses with suspicious activity

trans-unit.source: This report shows sign ins from IP addresses where suspicious activity has been detected. Suspicious activity in this case is defined to be an unsually high failed sign ins to successful sign ins ratio, which may indicate that an IP is being used for malicious purposes.
trans-unit.target: This report shows sign ins from IP addresses where suspicious activity has been detected. Suspicious activity in this case is defined to be an unsually high failed sign ins to successful sign ins ratio, which may indicate that an IP is being used for malicious purposes.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Sign ins from IP addresses with suspicious activity</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Sign ins from IP addresses with suspicious activity</linkText>
